    • incStack

      public int incStack(int n) throws ExecutionException
      Increases the stack size by n words.
      Parameters:
      n - Number of words to increment by
      Returns:
      The PREVIOUS contents of the ST register
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - In case of a stack overflow

    • decStack

      public int decStack(int n) throws ExecutionException
      Decreases the stack size by n words.
      Parameters:
      n - Number of words to decrement by
      Returns:
      The NEW contents of the ST register
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - In case of a stack underflow

    • pushStack

      public void pushStack(Value val) throws ExecutionException
      Pushes a single word onto the stack.
      Parameters:
      val - Value to push onto the stack
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - In case of a stack overflow
